cieslarmichal/faker-cxx

Generates data for C++ developers

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Generates fake data for Python
  • generates realistic test data like names, addresses, emails, and dates for development
  • Translates Unreal Engine Blueprints into C++
  • Library for generating fake names, addresses, and phone numbers
  • Fake data generator for .NET
  • modern C++ formatting library, fast printf alternative
  • JSON and binary serialization for C++ objects, with simple interfaces for reading and writing data
  • curated list of C++ libraries, frameworks, and tools
